description: Numbers n such that base 2 representation is d(0)d(1)...d(n), where d=A005614 (the infinite Fibonacci word).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) + A005614(n) for n > 0, a(0) = 1. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 07 2012]
prog: (Haskell)a044432 n = a044432_list !! na044432_list = scanl1 (\v b -> 2 * v + b) a005614_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 07 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
